commit message: Fixes an issue where multi user blogs that set a blogId would point to the wrong .com blog for jetpack stats.  The app interpreted this as either failing auth or jetpack being connnected to a different .com account.
Don't match anything past the RSD href attribute, fixes issue where themes had a different closing tag for the RSD link.
Adding a few try/catch blocks to see if it helps strange Fragment illegalStateException.
null check when getting categories property of Post model
Don't show category alert if user leaves activity. Fixes crash reported in Google Play report. Also applied formatting to SelectCategories class
Fix for Reader crash when trying to open topics selector after activity was closed.
Fix for getResources() crash in Google Play report.
null check on parent category selection.
